item.title: TryHackMe: ColddBox
item.description: Here’s my write-up for ColddBox, a CTF challenge created by C0ldd. Write-up I deployed the box using TryHackMe’s interface and scanned the host using nmap: Two ports were open: HTTP on port 80 and SSH on 4512. Wordpress was running on port 80, and given its proclivity for vulnerabilities, I started scanning the IP with gobuster. gobuster identified a page under “/hidden” which exposed some important information: C0ldd, you changed Hugo’s password, when you can send it to him so he can continue uploading his articles.
